name: Crème anglaise
recipeIngredient: 1 vanilla pod (split lengthways, seeds scraped out),
recipeInstructions: 1. For the crème anglaise, place the milk, double cream, vanilla pod and seeds into a non-stick saucepan and heat until just boiling.
2. Meanwhile, whisk together the egg yolks and caster sugar, until light and fluffy.
3. Remove the vanilla pod from the warm milk and cream mixture and gradually add the milk to the beaten eggs and sugar, whisking continuously.
4. Pour the mixture back into the saucepan and heat, whisking continuously, for a further two minutes, or until the custard has thickened slightly.
5. Remove from the heat and stir in the orange zest.
